fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier

Class DoubleSAG

  • java.lang.Object
    • fr.lip6.jkernelmachines.classifier.DoubleSAG
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Classifier<double[]>, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable

    public class DoubleSAG
extends java.lang.Object
implements Classifier<double[]>, java.io.Serializable
    Linear SVM using the SAG algorithm:
    "A Stochastic Gradient Method with an Exponential Convergence Rate for Strongly-Convex Optimization with Finite Training Sets",
    Nicolas Le Roux, Mark Schmidt and Francis Bach.
    Author:
    picard
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • isCyclic

        public boolean isCyclic()
        Is the algorithm doing epoch of ordered samples
        Returns:
        true if all epochs are through ordered samples, false if the sample order is randomized at each epoch

      • setCyclic

        public void setCyclic(boolean cyclic)
        Set the order of the sample at each epoch
        Parameters:
        cyclic - true is the order remains the same through all epochs, false is the order is randomized at each epoch
